message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe would be a great asset to your business. It's valued at $1500000, and I'm confident it will bring significant value to your operations. I'm offering it to you at a special price of $1750000. This price reflects the exceptional nature of the product and its potential for growth within your company. Please let me know if you're interested, as I'm sure this will be a mutually beneficial opportunity.
